means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 海因德绰号，温和或胆小的人，来源于中世纪英语、古英语，含义是“母鹿”(female deer)
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 海因德 Hine的变体

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些词均有"在后，向后"之意。
means: back ： 作为副词或形容词时，强调所修饰物的位置以及动作运动方向。
backward ： 可用于人或物，指向后的，落后的或迟钝的。
hind ： 指成对并且分前后的东西的"后面的"。
behind ： 指一物同它物相对的位置或场所。

sentence.Network_en: The higher rates have been a hind-rance to economic recovery.
sentence.Network_cn: 高利率已经成为经济复苏的障碍。

sentence.Network_en: You would be more of a hind-rance than a help.
sentence.Network_cn: 你帮不上忙，反倒会碍事。

sentence.Network_en: Suddenly the cow kicked up its hind legs.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 星火英语四级词汇表·巧记·速记·精练 - 豆丁网 ... behind prep. 在…后面;落后于;支持 hind a. 后面的 hinder vt. 妨碍.
雌鹿被称为奶牛（doe，cow）或者雌鹿（hind）。小鹿指未满周岁的小鹿（fawn）或者小牛（calve）。
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... himself 他自己 hind 后边的 hinder 阻止.
高中英语第一册词汇表 ... visitor n. 访问者；参观者 hind adj. 后面的，后部的 lay vt. 放，搁；下(蛋).

list.abs: hilum of the lung 肺门hind brain 后脑hind gut 后肠
hind intestine 后肠hind kidney 后肾hind leg 后肢
...多数成虫在中胸和后胸各有一对翅(wing)，分别为前翅(fore wing)和后翅(hind wing)。足和翅均为昆虫的运动器官.
生活英语单词大全 - 豆丁网 ... 前腿 fore leg 后腿 hind leg 猪蹄 pettitoes.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: perhaps shortened from Old English behindan (see behind)
Old English, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch hinde and German Hinde, from an Indo-European root meaning 'hornless', shared by Greek kemas 'young deer'
late Old English hīne 'household servants', apparently from hīgna, hīna, genitive plural of hīgan, hīwan 'family members'

entry.def: An animal's hind legs are at the back of its body.

example.ex: Suddenly the cow kicked up its hind legs.

entry.def: A hind is a female deer, especially one of the red deer family.

means.word_mean: 1. any of several mostly spotted fishes that resemble groupers
1. located at or near the back of an animal;

auth_sentence.content: This is a bear walking on its hind legs.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is a bear walking on its hind legs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is a bear walking on its hind legs.

auth_sentence.content: The hind part of the worm wriggles the most.
auth_sentence.res_content: The hind part of the worm wriggles the most.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The hind part of the worm wriggles the most.

auth_sentence.content: The hind toe of each foot is very mobile.
auth_sentence.res_content: The hind toe of each foot is very mobile.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The hind toe of each foot is very mobile.

stems_affixes.word_buile: hind后部→adj.后边的, 后面的
hindr=hinder妨碍+ance性质,状况→n.障碍,妨碍
hind后部+er反复做→拖后腿→阻止,妨碍

abbreviation.mean_cn: (德语)印度斯坦人，印度斯坦语

sentences.en: It’s easy to say now what we should have done then—with the wisdom of hind sight!
sentences.cn: 现在说我们当时应该如何做是不难的——这全是事后聪明。

sentences.en: The animal is able to stand up on its hind limbs.
sentences.cn: 这种动物能够用后肢站立。

means.word_mean: (通常与can或could连用)唠叨不停；滔滔不绝

sentences.en: He would make a good politician—he could talk the hind legs off a donkey!
sentences.cn: 他做政客肯定合适——他能滔滔不绝地说个不停。
